entry.title: Synthesis, activity exploration, molecular docking, and affinity assessment of theophylline derivatives as inhibitors targeting IDO1
entry.summary: Article by Ziyuan Wu, Songmao Liang, Shunhua Hu, Yimian Wang, Long-Fei Mao, Xixi Hou, Jianxue Yang DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/hc-2025-0180

entry.title: Development of heterocyclic-based anticancer agents: A comprehensive review
entry.summary: Article by Mohammed Hadi Ali Al-Jumaili, Ekhlas Aziz Bakr, Mohanad A. Huessien, Ahmed Solaiman Hamed, Mohammed J. Muhaidi DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/hc-2022-0179
